personal.name: Manoj Kumar
personal.headline_base: B2B SaaS Demand Generation & Growth Leader

summary_master: Enterprise B2B SaaS marketing leader with 10+ years of experience driving demand generation, ABM strategy, and full-funnel growth across APAC, North America, and India. Proven success delivering multi-channel programs for enterprise technology brands including Dell and Salesforce ISV partners. Expert in aligning paid media, CRM automation, and sales enablement to accelerate MQL-to-SQL velocity, improve attribution clarity, and scale revenue impact. Strong operator with experience managing cross-functional teams, enterprise budgets, and multi-market campaigns.

high_impact_achievements: Led enterprise B2B demand generation programs across paid media, ABM, and CRM automation for global technology clients.
Managed cross-functional teams across paid search, LinkedIn Ads, email automation, and analytics to drive pipeline acceleration.
Executed ABM campaigns aligned to sales segments, increasing client engagement by 15%.
Improved ROI by 20% through performance optimization and attribution modeling.
Supervised Eloqua-based nurture workflows improving MQL-to-SQL velocity.
Managed enterprise budgets with structured pacing, forecasting, and ROI analysis.
Managed full programmatic lifecycle including planning, media buying, optimization, and reporting.
Improved budget utilization by 25% through SEM audits and funnel restructuring.
Increased ad performance by 30% via advanced audience targeting and segmentation.
Delivered cross-channel attribution insights to support enterprise clients.
Supported SaaS lead generation initiatives across North American markets.

experience.role: Account Manager – Digital Performance & SaaS Growth
high_impact_achievements: Managed enterprise-level digital accounts including SaaS and technology brands.
Improved campaign performance by 20% through advanced reporting frameworks.
Executed budget pacing and forecasting strategies aligned with revenue targets.
Integrated CRM insights into paid media strategy to improve lead quality.
Led performance reviews and executive reporting for key accounts.
Led cross-functional marketing team delivering global B2B campaigns.
Increased lead conversions by 25% through automation workflows.
Managed programmatic media buying and data-driven optimization.
Built automated nurture sequences improving pipeline efficiency.
Trained and mentored team members on ABM and SaaS marketing practices.

experience.role: Subject Matter Expert – Performance & eCommerce Marketing
high_impact_achievements: Managed Google Ads and affiliate programs driving 20% revenue growth.
Executed advanced bid strategies and keyword optimization.
Improved quality score and conversion efficiency.
Conducted market research and competitive analysis.
Built email campaigns with segmentation and compliance frameworks.

highlights: Executed geo-targeted campaigns for CIO and IT decision-makers.
Improved SQL velocity through CRM workflow optimization.
Executed LinkedIn ABM using matched audiences.
